review_data.title: Lovely place with delicious drinks and snacks

review_data.title: Nice and quiet
review_data.content: Nice bar specialised in less usual cocktails. I personally found the staff a bit distant, I did not feel a very warm welcome. The staff was however competent and could anticipate special wishes.

review_data.title: World of drinks
review_data.content: Felix is one of the lovely places in Zurich to enjoy a good drink! The bartenders know their spirits and the handcrafted drinks are extraordinary!! You can really feel the passion for good drinks within the staff!! And on top we got a free plate...More
